short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to the World of the Web. Make Sure to Carry your Raygun at all Times.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hop into the portal to Valoria, where you may find the Valorian RayGun. This RayGun allows for peer to peer interdimensional communication. You may present yourself however you like.
